meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6125.

td.p: Anselm Chen, an educational consultant from Alamo, California
Kimberly Sheppard, a legal assistant from Fort Worth, Texas
Christopher Short, a pub trivia editor from Crawfordsville, Indiana (whose 5-day cash winnings total $68,399)

tr.td: IT BORDERS JUST ONE OTHER COUNTRY
21st CENTURY MUSIC
BABY NAMES A LA SHAKESPEARE
YES, THAT'S "WHITE"
WHEN THE SAINTS
COME, HO CHI MINH
